processSteps.title: Free Consultation
processSteps.description: We start with a thorough assessment of your needs and space to recommend the best solution for your home and budget.

processSteps.title: Custom Quote
processSteps.description: Receive a detailed, transparent quote with no hidden fees. We explain all options and help you make an informed decision.

processSteps.title: Professional Installation
processSteps.description: Our certified technicians complete the installation with precision, following all manufacturer specifications and local codes.

processSteps.title: Testing & Walkthrough
processSteps.description: We thoroughly test the new system and walk you through its operation, answering any questions you may have.

faqs.question: How long does a typical installation take?
faqs.answer: Most installations are completed in one day, typically 4-8 hours depending on the complexity of the project. We'll provide a specific timeline during your consultation.

faqs.question: Do you offer financing options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer flexible financing options to make your installation affordable. Ask us about current promotions and payment plans.

faqs.question: What brands do you install?
faqs.answer: We work with all major industry-leading brands and can help you select the best option for your needs and budget.

faqs.question: Is there a warranty on the installation?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All our installations come with a comprehensive warranty covering both parts and labor. Manufacturer warranties also apply to equipment.

processSteps.title: Emergency Response
processSteps.description: Contact us anytime, day or night. We prioritize urgent repairs and can often arrive within an hour for emergencies.

processSteps.title: Accurate Diagnosis
processSteps.description: Using advanced diagnostic equipment, we quickly identify the root cause of the problem, not just the symptoms.

processSteps.title: Transparent Pricing
processSteps.description: Before any work begins, we provide a clear explanation of the issue and a firm price quote for the repair.

processSteps.title: Expert Repair
processSteps.description: We complete the repair using quality parts and back our work with a satisfaction guarantee.

faqs.question: How quickly can you respond to a repair call?
faqs.answer: For emergencies, we typically arrive within 1-2 hours. For non-emergency repairs, we usually schedule same-day or next-day appointments.

faqs.question: Do you charge for diagnostics?
faqs.answer: We charge a standard diagnostic fee, which is waived if you proceed with the recommended repair.

faqs.question: What if the repair doesn't fix the problem?
faqs.answer: We stand behind our work with a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If the issue persists, we'll return at no additional charge to make it right.

faqs.question: Should I repair or replace my system?
faqs.answer: We'll provide honest recommendations based on the age of your system, repair costs, and potential energy savings of a new unit. We never push unnecessary replacements.

processSteps.title: 24/7 Availability
processSteps.description: Call us anytimeâ€”our emergency hotline is staffed around the clock, every day of the year.

processSteps.title: Rapid Dispatch
processSteps.description: We immediately dispatch the nearest available technician to your location, typically arriving within an hour.

processSteps.title: Quick Assessment
processSteps.description: Our technician quickly assesses the situation, prioritizing safety and preventing further damage.

processSteps.title: Immediate Resolution
processSteps.description: We carry a full inventory of common parts to complete most emergency repairs on the spot.

faqs.question: What qualifies as an emergency?
faqs.answer: Emergencies include complete system failures, safety hazards, water damage, no heat in winter, no cooling in extreme heat, or any situation that threatens your property or comfort.

faqs.question: Is emergency service more expensive?
faqs.answer: Emergency calls have an after-hours service fee, but repair costs remain the same. We believe in fair, transparent pricing even in emergencies.

faqs.question: How fast can you get to my location?
faqs.answer: Most emergency calls receive service within 60 minutes. Response times may vary during extreme weather events when call volumes are high.

faqs.question: Do you service all brands in emergencies?
faqs.answer: Yes, our technicians are trained on all major brands and carry parts for the most common systems.

processSteps.title: Schedule Inspection
processSteps.description: Book a convenient time for our certified inspector to visit your property. Most inspections take 1-2 hours.

processSteps.title: Comprehensive Evaluation
processSteps.description: We examine all components, test system performance, check for safety issues, and assess efficiency.

processSteps.title: Detailed Report
processSteps.description: Receive a comprehensive written report with photos, findings, and prioritized recommendations.

processSteps.title: Expert Guidance
processSteps.description: We review the report with you, answer questions, and provide cost estimates for any recommended work.

faqs.question: How often should I have an inspection?
faqs.answer: We recommend annual inspections for most systems. Older systems or those under heavy use may benefit from more frequent inspections.

faqs.question: What's included in the inspection?
faqs.answer: Our comprehensive inspection covers all major components, safety checks, efficiency testing, and identification of potential issues. You'll receive a detailed written report.

faqs.question: Can you inspect before I buy a home?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Pre-purchase inspections are one of our most common services. We'll provide a thorough assessment to help inform your buying decision.

faqs.question: Will you try to sell me services I don't need?
faqs.answer: Never. Our inspectors provide honest assessments and clearly distinguish between critical issues, recommended maintenance, and optional upgrades.

processSteps.title: Energy Audit
processSteps.description: We evaluate your current system's efficiency and identify opportunities for improvement and savings.

processSteps.title: Customized Recommendations
processSteps.description: Based on your goals and budget, we present upgrade options with projected ROI and energy savings.

processSteps.title: Rebate Assistance
processSteps.description: We help you navigate available rebates, tax credits, and financing options to maximize your savings.

processSteps.title: Professional Installation
processSteps.description: Our certified team installs your upgrades with minimal disruption and ensures optimal performance.

faqs.question: What are the most cost-effective upgrades?
faqs.answer: Programmable thermostats, improved insulation, and high-efficiency equipment typically offer the best return on investment through reduced energy costs.

faqs.question: Are there tax credits or rebates available?
faqs.answer: Many energy-efficient upgrades qualify for federal tax credits, state rebates, and utility incentives. We stay current on all programs and help you maximize available benefits.

faqs.question: How much can I save with an upgrade?
faqs.answer: Savings vary based on your current system and chosen upgrades, but many customers see 20-40% reductions in energy costs. We provide specific estimates during consultation.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade in phases?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We can create a phased upgrade plan that fits your budget while still delivering meaningful improvements over time.

processSteps.title: Choose Your Plan
processSteps.description: Select from our flexible maintenance plans designed to fit your needs and budget.

processSteps.title: Scheduled Service
processSteps.description: We automatically schedule your maintenance visits at optimal times throughout the year.

processSteps.title: Thorough Maintenance
processSteps.description: Each visit includes cleaning, inspection, adjustments, and minor repairs as needed.

processSteps.title: Priority Service
processSteps.description: Enjoy priority scheduling, extended warranties, and discounted rates on any needed repairs.

faqs.question: What's included in a maintenance plan?
faqs.answer: Plans include scheduled tune-ups, priority scheduling, discounted repair rates, extended warranties, and detailed maintenance records. Specific benefits vary by plan level.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, our plans are flexible. You can cancel at any time, though we're confident you'll see the value in continued membership.

faqs.question: Do maintenance plans really save money?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Regular maintenance reduces energy costs, prevents expensive breakdowns, and extends equipment life. Most members save more than the plan costs.

faqs.question: What if I need repairs between visits?
faqs.answer: Plan members receive priority scheduling and discounted rates on all repairs. Many plans also include coverage for certain repairs.
